facility_access_lift.name: Access Lift
facility_access_lift.description: Access Lifts enable XCOM's subterranean base to expand deeper into the earth.
facility_access_lift.tactical_text: • Before you can build or excavate on any level of the base, you must have built an access lift to that level

facility_alien_containment.name: Alien Containment
facility_alien_containment.description: This facility will provide a secure environment to house the alien captives, allowing you to interrogate them in the Labs.
facility_alien_containment.tactical_text:
• Required to capture aliens with the Arc Thrower
  • Without an Alien Containment, aliens can be stunned to recover their weapons intact, but no captive will be gained
  • Alien Containment is not needed to capture Outsiders for Outsider Shards
  • There is no limit to the number of captives XCOM can keep
  • If torn down, all captive aliens will be killed

facility_elerium_generator.name: Elerium Generator
facility_elerium_generator.tactical_text: • Costly, but the most efficient energy generation available to XCOM

facility_fission_generator.name: Fission Generator
facility_fission_generator.description: Power Generators supply the power needed to run new facilities. Each generator supplies 8 power.
facility_fission_generator.tactical_text: • The least powerful generator available to XCOM

facility_foundry.name: Foundry
facility_foundry.description: Develop new combat items or improve current items in the Foundry. This facility counts as a Workshop for adjacency benefits. Cannot be torn down once built.
facility_foundry.tactical_text:
• Allows XCOM to undertake special projects which enhance or unlock items
  • Each project has a minimum number of engineers; they can be started with less, but will take significantly longer

facility_genetics_lab.name: Genetics Lab
facility_genetics_lab.description: This annex to the Research Labs will allow us to genetically modify our soldiers.
facility_genetics_lab.tactical_text:
• Required to apply Gene Mods to soldiers
  • MEC Troopers cannot be gene modded
  • Each gene mod will increase the soldier's post-mission fatigue
  • Gene mods within a category can be switched between for a cost

facility_gollop_chamber.name: Gollop Chamber
facility_gollop_chamber.description: Once we build this facility, a psionically powerful soldier will be able to access the Ethereals' psychic net.
facility_gollop_chamber.tactical_text:
• Required to access the Temple Ship assault, the final mission of the campaign
  • Once built, the Gollop Chamber can be activated by placing a soldier in it
  • The chosen soldier must be psionically gifted, with a rank of Psion or Master, and wearing Vortex Armor
  • Once activated, nothing else can be done in the game except for the Temple Ship assault

facility_hyperwave_relay.name: Hyperwave Relay
facility_hyperwave_relay.description: Alien communications rely on a supra-dimensional wave which travels almost instantaneously. This relay should allow us to trace the source of these communications.
facility_hyperwave_relay.tactical_text:
• Allows XCOM to detect and engage Overseer UFOs
  • Shooting down an Overseer is necessary to recover an Ethereal Device, needed to complete the campaign
  • Shows XCOM the mission objective, crew size, and crew species of any UFO
  • If more than 7 species are present, only the first 7 will be shown

facility_laboratory.name: Laboratory
facility_laboratory.description: Each laboratory increases research speed by 20%.
facility_laboratory.tactical_text:
• Increases the research speed of scientists on staff by 20%, additive with other laboratories and adjacency bonuses
  • Building a laboratory requires XCOM to have 10 scientists on staff per existing laboratory, plus 10 more to staff the new lab

facility_officer_training_school.name: Officer Training School
facility_officer_training_school.description: Increase XCOM squad size and unlock officers, a special class of soldiers with abilities that help the entire squad. Cannot be torn down once built.
facility_officer_training_school.tactical_text:
• Provides access to squad size upgrades and the appointment of soldiers as Officers
  • XCOM must have at least one soldier of Corporal rank or higher to build the Officer Training School
  • Squad size upgrades increase the number of soldiers/SHIVs that XCOM can bring on most mission types
  • Officers gain access to the Command ability and special perks, depending on their officer rank
  • MEC Troopers and psionically gifted soldiers cannot be made into Officers, and vice versa

facility_psionic_labs.name: Psionic Labs
facility_psionic_labs.description: This facility will allow us to discover and develop the latent psionic abilities of our soldiers. If they have any such capabilities, using them in the field will increase their strength.
facility_psionic_labs.tactical_text:
• Allows XCOM to attempt to train their soldiers' latent psionic gifts
  • Psi training is not guaranteed to work, with the chance going up with the soldier's will and down with the psionic rank they are attempting to attain
  • Unsuccessful psi training will not prevent the soldier from trying again
  • Psi training takes between 5 and 10 days, with the soldier's will reducing the training time
  • Whenever a psionics rank is gained, the soldier randomly gains 1-6 will
  • Psionic soldiers cannot be MEC Troopers or Officers, and vice versa
  • Additional psi powers are unlocked via alien autopsies and interrogations

facility_repair_bay.name: Repair Bay
facility_repair_bay.description: This facility will allow us to repair items built in Engineering that are damaged in combat.
facility_repair_bay.tactical_text:
• Enables XCOM to repair damaged items and augment soldiers into MEC Troopers
  • Items may become damaged in combat if a soldier takes health damage; they can be repaired for a fee here
  • Soldiers must be of Lance Corporal rank or higher to undergo MEC augmentation, and will lose one rank in the process
  • The resulting MEC Trooper's class depends on the original class of the soldier
  • MEC augmentation of a soldier cannot be canceled once begun

facility_satellite_nexus.name: Satellite Nexus
facility_satellite_nexus.description: With the signal monitored by a team of engineers, each Satellite Nexus is capable of receiving transmissions from 2 XCOM satellites.
facility_satellite_nexus.tactical_text:
• Increases the maximum number of Satellites XCOM can have in orbit by +2
  • Constructing a Satellite Nexus requires a number of engineers on staff:
    • 10 engineers (base), plus
    • 10 engineers per Satellite Uplink, plus
    • 20 engineers per existing Satellite Nexus, plus
    • 20 engineers to staff the new Satellite Nexus

facility_satellite_uplink.name: Satellite Uplink
facility_satellite_uplink.description: With the signal monitored by a team of engineers, each Satellite Uplink is capable of receiving transmissions from 1 XCOM satellite.
facility_satellite_uplink.tactical_text:
• Increases the maximum number of Satellites XCOM can have in orbit by +1
  • Constructing a Satellite Nexus requires a number of engineers on staff:
    • 10 engineers per existing Satellite Uplink, plus
    • 20 engineers per Satellite Nexus, plus
    • 10 engineers to staff the new Satellite Uplink

facility_thermo_generator.name: Thermo Generator
facility_thermo_generator.description: Thermal Power Generators supply 25 power, but must be built over steam vents.
facility_thermo_generator.tactical_text:
• Can only be built on top of naturally-occurring steam vents
  • Significantly cheaper and much more easily accessible than Elerium Generators if steam vents are available

facility_workshop.name: Workshop
facility_workshop.description: Reduces item cost by 10% and gives a 10% refund on materials. Multiple workshops have diminishing returns, and discounts and refunds cannot exceed 50%.
facility_workshop.tactical_text:
• Reduces the credits cost of building items up-front; material cost reduction is provided as a refund once the item is complete
  • The formula for determining the price paid for items is 
    0.5 + 0.5 * 0.8 (numWorkshops + numAdjacencies)
  • Ex: with 1 workshop and 1 adjacency (e.g. the Foundry), the price is 
    0.5 + 0.5 * 0.8 (1 + 0.5 * 1) = 0.8577 = 85.77%
    Thus you will pay 85.77% of the normal price, for roughly a 14.22% discount
